title: spec:
body:
by **bronze1man**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
http://play.golang.org/p/GKZ8Xz5TMt

What is the expected output?
abc

What do you see instead?
prog.go:13: invalid receiver type a (a is an interface type)

I can not define a method on a type which base type is a interface.
I can not override a method on a type which base type is a interface.
